author: ravi_s

commands.name: setup-bucket
commands.title: Setup Bucket
commands.description: Enter credentials and bucket name to setup a bucket

commands.name: upload-files
commands.title: Upload Files
commands.description: Choose bucket and upload selected files

commands.name: manage-buckets
commands.title: Manage Buckets
commands.description: List, set default, and remove configured buckets

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
